com.hazelcast.client.spi

Interface ClientExecutionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Executor, TaskScheduler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientExecutionServiceImpl

    public interface ClientExecutionService
extends TaskScheduler
    Executor service for Hazelcast clients.

    Allows asynchronous execution and scheduling of Runnable and Callable commands.

    Any schedule submit or execute operation runs on internal executors. When user code needs to run getUserExecutor() should be utilized

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutorService getUserExecutor() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.spi.TaskScheduler

        schedule, schedule, scheduleWithRepetition

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Executor

        execute

    • Method Detail

      • getUserExecutor

        ExecutorService getUserExecutor()
        Returns:
        executorService that alien (user code) runs on
